Hi, I’m Mariam and thanks for stopping by. I’m a Graphic Designer working in UI/UX, branding, and print. Drawing, painting, and photography are some things I like in addition to my cat, making coffee, and watching Cheers. I just graduated with a BFA in Graphic Design from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

Here, you can take a look at some of my favorite projects I’ve worked on, and feel free to contact me if you’re interested in working together!
